question: 運転手
sourceMnemonic: You know that <kanji><ja>運転</ja></kanji> has to do with driving, right? And you know that <kanji><ja>手</ja></kanji> often has to do with a person doing something in words like these. So, a person who does driving is what? A <vocabulary>driver</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading is all on'yomi, because it's jukugo. You should know the on'yomi reading of <ja>手</ja> by now just by seeing similar word patterns to this one.
